name: Unpackerr
short_desc: Extracts downloads for Radarr, Sonarr, Lidarr, Readarr and cleans up after import
author: Unpackerr
description: Unpackerr monitors your Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, and Readarr download queues and automatically extracts RAR and ZIP archives when downloads complete. It integrates seamlessly with the *arr apps to ensure your media files are ready for import.

form_fields.label: Sonarr URL
form_fields.hint: Use http://sonarr:8989 for Runtipi's Sonarr. Leave empty if not using Sonarr.

form_fields.label: Sonarr API Key
form_fields.hint: Get from Sonarr: Settings > General > Security. Required if using Sonarr.

form_fields.label: Radarr URL
form_fields.hint: Use http://radarr:7878 for Runtipi's Radarr. Leave empty if not using Radarr.

form_fields.label: Radarr API Key
form_fields.hint: Get from Radarr: Settings > General > Security. Required if using Radarr.

form_fields.label: Lidarr URL
form_fields.hint: Use http://lidarr:8686 for Runtipi's Lidarr. Leave empty if not using Lidarr.

form_fields.label: Lidarr API Key
form_fields.hint: Get from Lidarr: Settings > General > Security. Required if using Lidarr.

form_fields.label: Readarr URL
form_fields.hint: Use http://readarr:8787 for Runtipi's Readarr. Leave empty if not using Readarr.

form_fields.label: Readarr API Key
form_fields.hint: Get from Readarr: Settings > General > Security. Required if using Readarr.
